articles.title: Canada grizzly bear attack victims were on permitted hike, carrying bear spray - Reuters Canada
articles.description: The two people killed by a grizzly bear in Alberta's Banff National Park last week were on a permitted hiking and camping trip and there was no active be…
articles.content: Oct 3 (Reuters) - The two people killed by a grizzly bear in Alberta's Banff National Park last week were on a permitted hiking and camping trip and there was no active bear warning at the time incid… [+1779 chars]

articles.author: Daisy Dobrijevic
articles.title: NASA's Eclipse Explorer 2023 lets you track the Oct. 14 annular solar eclipse with new interactive map - Space.com
articles.description: The annular "ring of fire" solar eclipse will be visible across the Americas on Oct. 14, 2023.
